short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension banishes podcasts from the Spotify web player user interface.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a very simple Chrome extension which just does one thing - it hides the Podcasts bar on the Spotify web player using CSS attributes. Finally! No more Joe Rogan et al. Rejoice :-)

You can tell if it's loaded because it also changes the background colour of the main page area to a subtle dark blue.

Source code, such as it is, can be found on GitHub:
https://github.com/martin-hamilton/banish-spotify-podcasts
